fields.name: The Shining
fields.synopsis: Jack and his family move into an isolated hotel with a violent past. Living in isolation, Jack begins to lose his sanity, which affects his family members.
fields.author: Stephen King

fields.name: The Graduate
fields.synopsis: While he is lured into a seductive affair with the wife of his father's business partner, college graduate Benjamin also falls in love with her daughter, Elaine.
fields.author: Charles Webb

fields.name: Trainspotting
fields.synopsis: Renton is a drug addict who tries to mend his ways by moving to London and starting life afresh. He, however, is pulled back into the world of addiction by his friends.
fields.author: Irvin Welsh

fields.name: A Clockwork Orange
fields.synopsis: Alex, a psychopathic delinquent, is imprisoned for murder. In order to reduce his sentence, he volunteers for an experimental therapy conducted by the government, but it goes askew.
fields.author: Anthony Burgess

fields.name: Pride and Prejudice
fields.synopsis: Mrs Bennet insists that her daughters find rich husbands and settle down. When a wealthy bachelor starts living near them, Mrs Bennet's happiness knows no bounds.
fields.author: Jane Austen

fields.name: Requiem for a Dream
fields.synopsis: "Requiem for a Dream" tells parallel stories that are linked by the relationship between the lonely, widowed Sara Goldfarb and her sweet but aimless son, Harry.
fields.author: Hubert Selby Jr.

fields.name: If Beale Street Could Talk
fields.synopsis: The lives of childhood friends and lovers Tish and Fonny take a drastic turn when Fonny gets falsely accused of a crime. A pregnant Tish then sets out to prove his innocence.
fields.author: James Baldwin

fields.name: Gone Girl
fields.synopsis: Nick Dunne discovers that the entire media focus has shifted on him when his wife, Amy Dunne, mysteriously disappears on the day of their fifth wedding anniversary.
fields.author: Gillian Flynn

fields.name: The Age of Innocence
fields.synopsis: Newland Archer is a lawyer who is happily engaged to May. However, his life turns upside down when he meets and falls in love with May's scandalous cousin, Ellen.
fields.author: Edith Wharton

fields.name: American Psycho
fields.synopsis: Patrick Bateman, a wealthy investment banker, hides his psychopathic ego from his friends. Later, his illogical fantasies escalate and he submits to an uncontrollable bloodlust.
fields.author: Bret Easton Ellis

fields.name: The Godfather
fields.synopsis: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.
fields.author: Mario Puzo

fields.name: Mysterious Skin
fields.synopsis: One youth becomes obsessed with UFOs, while another becomes a gay hustler in the years following a childhood trauma.
fields.author: Scott Heim

fields.name: Battle Royale
fields.synopsis: 42 9th graders are sent to a deserted island. They are given a map, food, and various weapons. An explosive collar is fitted around their neck. If they break a rule, the collar explodes. Their mission: kill each other and be the last one standing.
fields.author: Koushun Takami

fields.name: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
fields.synopsis: Raoul is a journalist who along with his lawyer head to Las Vegas to cover the mint 400 motorcycle race. Soon pleasure overtakes work and they indulge in a variety of recreational drugs.
fields.author: Hunter S. Thompson

fields.name: We Need to Talk About Kevin
fields.synopsis: Pregnancy does not seem to agree with Eva, but what's worse, when she does give birth to a baby boy named Kevin, she can't seem to bond with him. When Kevin grows from a fussy, demanding toddler into a sociopathic teen, Eva is forced to deal with the aftermath of her son's horrific act.
fields.author: Lionel Shriver

fields.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
fields.synopsis: In the Depression era, Atticus Finch, a lawyer, sets out to defend a black man, who is accused of raping a white woman. Meanwhile, his children, Scout and Jem, spy on their reclusive neighbour.
fields.author: Harper Lee

fields.name: Fight Club
fields.synopsis: Unhappy with his capitalistic lifestyle, a white-collared insomniac forms an underground fight club with Tyler, a careless soap salesman. Soon, their venture spirals down into something sinister.
fields.author: Chuck Palahniuk

fields.name: Room
fields.synopsis: After years of being held captive in an isolated shed by a kidnapper, Joy and her little son, Jack, manage to escape the confinement and gain their freedom.
fields.author: Emma Donoghue

fields.name: The Color Purple
fields.synopsis: Celie, a young African-American woman, is raped by her father and bears two of his children. She is then married off to an abusive man and has a struggle-filled existence.
fields.author: Alice Walker

fields.name: Lust, Caution
fields.synopsis: A young woman, Wang Jiazhi, gets swept up in a dangerous game of emotional intrigue with a powerful political figure, Mr. Yee.
fields.author: Eileen Chang

fields.name: Little Women
fields.synopsis: While the March sisters enter the threshold of womanhood, they go through many ups and downs in life and endeavour to make important decisions that can affect their future.
fields.author: Louisa May Walcott

fields.name: Never Let Me Go
fields.synopsis: Kathy, Tommy and Ruth are raised in an idyllic environment at Hailsham, a boarding school. Even as they deal with pangs of love, a teacher lets it slip that their fate has already been written.
fields.author: Kazuo Ishiguro

fields.name: The Virgin Suicides
fields.synopsis: This fictional story centers on the lives of five doomed sisters, the Lisbon girls. The story is told in first person plural from the perspective of an anonymous group of teenage boys who struggle to find an explanation for the Lisbons' deaths.
fields.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

fields.name: Picnic at Hanging Rock
fields.synopsis: Appleyard College, a girls' private school, plans a summer picnic to Hanging Rock in Victoria. However, things turn bad when a few students and a teacher go missing at the picnic.
fields.author: Joan Lindsay

fields.name: Frankenstein
fields.synopsis: Frankenstein tells the story of Victor Frankenstein, a young scientist who creates a sapient creature in an unorthodox scientific experiment.
fields.author: Mary Shelley

fields.name: A Streetcar Named Desire
fields.synopsis: Blanche DuBois, a young woman, must take a streetcar to her sister's house in New Orleans. She faces scorn from her brother-in-law and simultaneously gets attracted to his friend.
fields.author: Tennesse Williams

fields.name: Diary of a Teenage Girl
fields.synopsis: In 1970s San Francisco, a precocious 15-year-old  embarks on an enthusiastic sexual odyssey, beginning with her mother's current lover.
fields.author: Phoebe Gloeckner

fields.name: The Silence of the Lambs
fields.synopsis: Clarice Starling, an FBI agent, seeks help from Hannibal Lecter, a psychopathic serial killer and former psychiatrist, in order to apprehend another serial killer who has been claiming female victims.
fields.author: Thomas Harris

fields.name: Drive
fields.synopsis: A stuntman and getaway driver falls in love with Irene who is married to a criminal. In a bid to protect her from her husband and some gangsters, he decides to cross over to the other side of the law.
fields.author: James Sallis

fields.name: The Great Gatsby
fields.synopsis: Nick Carraway, a World War I veteran who moves to New York with the hope of making it big, finds himself attracted to Jay Gatsby and his flamboyant lifestyle.
fields.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

fields.name: Everything is Illuminated
fields.synopsis: A young man sets out on a quest to find the woman who saved his grandfather in a small Ukrainian town that was wiped off the map by the Nazi invasion during the World War.
fields.author: Jonathon Safran Foer

fields.name: I'm Thinking of Ending Things
fields.synopsis: A young woman soon finds herself with misgivings after travelling with her new boyfriend to his parents' secluded farm.
fields.author: Iain Reid

fields.name: One Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest
fields.synopsis: In order to escape the prison labour, McMurphy, a prisoner, fakes insanity and is shifted to the special ward for the mentally unstable. In this ward, he must rise up against a cruel nurse, Ratched.
fields.author: Ken Kesey

fields.name: No Country For Old Men
fields.synopsis: A hunter's life takes a drastic turn when he discovers two million dollars while strolling through the aftermath of a drug deal. He is then pursued by a psychopathic killer who wants the money.
fields.author: Cormac McCarthy

fields.name: Sense and Sensibility
fields.synopsis: After the death of their father, three young girls find themselves in abject poverty. The responsibility to provide for the family lands on the oldest sisters, who are also dealing with heartbreaks.
fields.author: Jane Austen

fields.name: Romeo and Juliet
fields.synopsis: The rivalry between Verona's two well-established families, the Capulets and the Montagues, affects the relationship of their children Romeo and Juliet.
fields.author: William Shakespeare
